CustomField.description: Unique key to identify the relationship between an Offline profile, object name and related object. Calculated automatically
CustomField.formula: IF(Len( Related_To__r.Object_Name__c )<1 , Offline_Profile__r.Profile_Name__c & "_" & Object_Name__c , Offline_Profile__r.Profile_Name__c & "_" & Object_Name__c & "_" & Related_To__r.Object_Name__c )
CustomField.label: Profile Key
